entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Periods of rain over Grand Manan Island late this evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023
